title: Keke Palmer Blasts Trey Songz For Featuring Her In â€œPick Up The Phoneâ€ Video Without Permission
text:
Keke Palmer Blasts Trey Songz For Featuring Her In â€œPick Up The Phoneâ€ Video Without Permission January 23, 2017 | 4:54 PM 4 
Keke Palmer took to Twitter and Instagram over the weekend to blast Trey Songz after the singer-songwriter featured her in his â€œPick Up The Phoneâ€ video without permission. The video has since been pulled from the Internet. 
After a fan alerted the actress to the video via Twitter, Palmer quickly responded, condemning Trey Songz for releasing the visuals despite continually expressing her reluctance to be involved. 
â€œThis was not approved. You can not use someoneâ€™s â€˜likenessâ€™ without their approval. Casing point of female disrespect in the industry,â€ she tweeted before continuing in a string of subsequent posts. â€œI didnâ€™t even know they were filming. Meanwhile I said I did not want to be in the video. I said it more than once and kept being pressured. I remember this day very well because I so badly didnâ€™t want to be in the video that I HID IN THE CLOSET to avoid conflict. I literally said no. I canâ€™t believe they still put me in it. I said no!â€ This was not approved. You can not use someone's "likeness" without their approval. Casing point of female disrespect in the industry. https://t.co/mhwazDvcat

Palmer later took to Instagram to continue her tirade, accusing Trey Songz of goading her into being filmed with â€œfood, alcoholâ€ and â€œsexual intimidation.â€ A photo posted by Laurennnn Palmer (@kekepalmer) on Jan 21, 2017 at 4:54pm PST 
She also shared two videos detailing her story of what she thought was just a party in Miami. A video posted by Laurennnn Palmer (@kekepalmer) on Jan 21, 2017 at 5:57pm PST A video posted by Laurennnn Palmer (@kekepalmer) on Jan 21, 2017 at 6:26pm PST A photo posted by Laurennnn Palmer (@kekepalmer) on Jan 22, 2017 at 10:27am PST 
After catching wind of Palmerâ€™s comments, Trey Songz took to Twitter and Instagram to share his thoughts on the matter. 
â€œBabygirl buggin. Point blank period. Got my number, coulda called, saw the cameras and the lights, heard action,â€ he tweeted before continuing in a subsequent post. â€œI donâ€™t do this twitter shit, girl you know me and got my number fuck outta hereâ€ Babygirl buggin. Point blank period. Got my number, coulda called, saw the cameras and the lights, heard action.
